sentences.sContent: She lays a kindly hand like a tiny starfish on my knee.
sentences.sContent_eng: She lays a kindly hand like a tiny starfish on my knee.
sentences.sCn: 她和善地伸出手，像小海星一样放在我的膝盖上。

sentences.sContent: In the oceans, you can find starfish and sea horses. They are interesting and beautiful sea animals.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the oceans, you can find starfish and sea horses. They are interesting and beautiful sea animals.
sentences.sCn: 在海洋中，你能看到海星以及海马，它们都是很有趣并且美丽的海洋动物。

sentences.sContent: One reason is their diet: They eat only starfish (and sometimes sea urchins), and they reportedly prefer to eat them alive.
sentences.sContent_eng: One reason is their diet: They eat only starfish (and sometimes sea urchins), and they reportedly prefer to eat them alive.
sentences.sCn: 原因之一是它们的饮食：它们只能吃到海星（有时是海胆），据报道它们喜欢吃活的。

trans.tranOther: a flat sea animal that has five arms forming the shape of a star
